code:
graph TD
    subgraph "Tree Detection"
        PLR[Retail_Inventory] --> SCAN[Retail_CustomerLoyalty]
        SCAN --> LOGS[Retail_PointOfSale]
        LOGS --> CLUSTER[Retail_CouponSystem]
        CLUSTER --> BASE[Retail_PointOfSale]
        BASE --> CHECK{Retail_PointOfSale}
        CHECK -->|No| ADD[Retail_CustomerLoyalty]
        CHECK -->|Yes| SKIP[Retail_CouponSystem]
        ADD --> TREES[Retail_OrderManagement]
    end
    
    subgraph "Tree Cutting Process"
        REQ[Retail_CouponSystem] --> LLM[Retail_OrderManagement]
        LLM --> COORD[Retail_CouponSystem]
        COORD --> MOVE[Retail_CouponSystem]
        MOVE --> START[Retail_OrderManagement]
        
        START --> HEIGHT[Retail_OrderManagement]
        HEIGHT --> FINDLOGS[Retail_Inventory]
        FINDLOGS --> HASLOG{Retail_PointOfSale}
        
        HASLOG -->|Yes| CUT[Retail_CouponSystem]
        HASLOG -->|No| NEXTH[Retail_PointOfSale]
        
        CUT --> EFFECTS[Retail_PointOfSale]
        EFFECTS --> WOOD[Retail_CustomerLoyalty]
        WOOD --> MORE{Retail_PointOfSale}
        
        MORE -->|Yes| HEIGHT
        MORE -->|No| NEXTH
        
        NEXTH --> MAXH{Retail_CouponSystem}
        MAXH -->|No| HEIGHT
        MAXH -->|Yes| DONE[Retail_Inventory]
        
        DONE --> MARK[Retail_OrderManagement]
        MARK --> COMPLETE[Retail_PointOfSale]
    end
    
    subgraph "Cut Tree Registry"
        MARK --> REGISTRY[Retail_Inventory]
        REGISTRY --> KEY[Retail_Inventory]
        KEY --> PERSIST[Retail_PointOfSale]
        PERSIST --> PREVENT[Retail_CustomerLoyalty]
    end
    
    style SCAN fill:#e8f5e8
    style CUT fill:#ffebee
    style EFFECTS fill:#fff3e0
    style REGISTRY fill:#f3e5f5
repo_description: Intelligent Agentic NPCs for Minecraft with LLM Integration
